business_account_id.description: The unique identifier for the business account associated with the media.

page_id.description: The unique identifier for the Instagram page associated with the media.

caption.description: The caption or description provided for the media.

comments_count.description: The total number of comments received on the media.

id.description: The unique identifier for the media item.

ig_id.description: The Instagram-specific identifier for the media item.

is_comment_enabled.description: A flag indicating whether comments are enabled for the media.

like_count.description: The total number of likes received on the media.

media_type.description: The type of media (e.g., image, video) of the media item.

media_product_type.description: The product type associated with the media (e.g., shopping product).

media_url.description: The URL for accessing the media content of the media item.

owner.description: Contains information about the owner of the post.

id.description: The unique identifier of the owner of the media item.

permalink.description: The permanent link to the media item on Instagram.

shortcode.description: The unique shortcode assigned to the media item.

thumbnail_url.description: The URL for accessing the thumbnail image of the media item.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the media item was created.

username.description: The username of the owner of the media item.

children.description: Contains an array of media items that are part of the post.

items.description: Properties of each media item like image, caption, etc.

id.description: The unique identifier for the child media item.

ig_id.description: The Instagram-specific identifier for the child media item.

media_type.description: The type of media of the child item (e.g., image, video).

media_url.description: The URL for accessing the media content of the child item.

owner.description: Contains information about the owner of the media item.

id.description: The unique identifier of the owner of the child media item.

permalink.description: The permanent link to the child media item on Instagram.

shortcode.description: The unique shortcode assigned to the child media item.

thumbnail_url.description: The URL for accessing the thumbnail image of the child media item.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the child media item was created.

username.description: The username of the owner of the child media item.
